CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. DTP: 2,2-Di(thiophene)s-co-3,3'-di(3-thienyl)propionate (a specific type of copolymer)
3. Copolymers: Unspecified type of polymers containing DTP
4. PC 70 BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) (a specific type of fullerene derivative)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. DTP-containing copolymers
2. PC 70 BM (Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP-containing copolymers |
| PC 70 BM (Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells)
2. DTP (Diketothiophene-based copolymers)
3. copolymers
4. PC (Polycrystalline silicon)
5. BM (Buffer Layer)
6. short-circuit current
7. 22.6 mA cm^-1 (unit: mA per square centimeter)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. short-circuit current
2. 22.6 mA cm^-1 (unit: mA per square centimeter)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The other entities are either types of materials or abbreviations for specific components in the solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short-circuit current |
| 22.6 mA cm^-1 (mA per square centimeter) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.
1. 22.6 mA cm^-1: This is a measure of the short-circuit current density, which is a property value for photovoltaic performance.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| short-circuit current density: 22.6 mA cm^-1 |
